item.title: 如何看待黄金的大幅上涨
item.description:
在Merryn Talks Money节目中，我们讨论了金属飙升背后的因素，以及它是否会继续扮演 "万能对冲工具 "的角色。【原文：

On Merryn Talks Money, we discuss the factors behind the metal’s surge and whether it will keep its role as the “everything hedge.”

】

item.title: 贝莱德称近期反弹后是时候退出英国债券押注了
item.description: 贝莱德公司放弃了自 10 月份以来持有的英国债券增持建议，预计对该国财政前景的担忧仍将持续。【原文：BlackRock Inc. is ditching an overweight recommendation on UK bonds held since October, anticipating that concern over the country’s fiscal outlook will persist.】

item.title: 阿美石油公司旗下 Motiva 公司扩建得克萨斯炼油厂，成为美国最大炼油厂
item.description: Motiva 企业悄然扩建了位于得克萨斯州阿瑟港的炼油厂，使其成为美国最大的燃料制造厂。【原文：Motiva Enterprises has quietly expanded its Port Arthur, Texas, refinery to become the largest fuelmaking plant in the US.】

item.title: 非洲能源银行本季度将以 50 亿美元入股开业
item.description: 尼日利亚石油资源国务部长 Heineken Lokpobiri 表示，计划已久的非洲能源银行将于本季度开始运营，成员国和股东将出资 50 亿美元。【原文：The long-planned Africa Energy Bank will start operations this quarter with $5 billion in equity from member nations and shareholders, said Nigerian Minister of State for Petroleum Resources Heineken Lokpobiri.】

item.title: 印度为不良贷款管理者出售股权扫清障碍
item.description: 印度央行将允许该国的坏账管理公司在当地公开市场上市。【原文：India’s central bank will allow the country’s bad debt managers to list equity shares in the local public market.】

item.title: CATL 申请在香港上市，可能融资 50 亿美元
item.description: 当代安培瑞斯科技有限公司（Amperex Technology Co.安培瑞斯科技有限公司（Amperex Technology Co.Ltd.）已提交在香港上市的申请，这可能是四年来香港最大的一次股票发行。【原文：Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd. has filed its application for a jumbo listing in Hong Kong that could be the city’s biggest stock offering in four years.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会和 Binance 要求暂停对交易所的诉讼 60 天
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会以特朗普政府尚未制定数字资产监管框架为由，请求搁置对加密货币交易所 Binance 的起诉。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission filed a request to put its case against crypto exchange Binance on hold, citing pending development of a regulatory framework for digital assets under the Trump administration.】

item.title: 英国石油公司的 "根本性重启 "为奥金霍斯设定了高标准
item.description:
首席执行官表示，他在过去一年中不断与股东会面，市场会喜欢石油巨头的新方向。【原文：

The chief executive officer says he’s met with shareholders constantly this past year, and the market will like oil major’s new direction.

】

item.title: 土耳其将于三月开始从土库曼斯坦进口天然气
item.description: 土耳其能源部长阿尔帕尔斯兰-巴伊拉克塔尔（Alparslan Bayraktar）表示，土耳其将从 3 月 1 日起首次从土库曼斯坦进口天然气。【原文：Turkey will import its first natural gas from Turkmenistan from March 1, according to Energy Minister Alparslan Bayraktar.】

item.title: 巴西一月份通胀因电费下降而放缓
item.description: 由于一次性能源信贷为消费者暂时缓解了一触即发的价格压力，巴西的通胀率在今年年初有所下降。【原文：Brazil inflation edged down at the start of the year, as one-time energy credits provided consumers temporary relief from simmering price pressures.】

item.title: Shopify 超过预期，称第一季度收入将增长 20% 左右
item.description: Shopify 公司第四季度的营收超出预期，表明其电子商务软件解决方案在繁忙的假日季度受到了商家的青睐。【原文：Shopify Inc.’s revenue for the fourth quarter exceeded expectations, suggesting its e-commerce software solutions stood out with merchants during the busy holiday quarter.】

item.title: 乌克兰批准从保加利亚购买两座核反应堆
item.description: 乌克兰立法者批准了一项法案，在该国西部的赫梅利尼茨基（Khmelnytskyi）核电站增建两个反应堆，为最终完成从保加利亚购买反应堆铺平了道路。【原文：Ukrainian lawmakers approved a bill to complete two additional reactors at the Khmelnytskyi nuclear power plant in the country’s west, paving the way for their purchase from Bulgaria to be finalized.】

item.title: 中美贸易战为活跃的二手芯片齿轮市场蒙上阴影
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，Mayumi Negishi 从东京发回的报道涉及二手芯片制造设备的世界，贸易限制在这里投下了巨大的阴影。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Mayumi Negishi writes from Tokyo about the world of used chipmaking equipment, where trade restrictions cast a big shadow.】

item.title: 欧盟展现 "实力 "对抗特朗普的金属关税
item.description: 欧盟威胁要对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普计划对所有进口钢铁和铝征收的关税进行报复，这有可能重新引发一场跨大西洋贸易战，除非世界上贸易和投资关系最密切的伙伴们能在下个月达成一项协议。【原文：The European Union threatened retaliation against US President Donald Trump’s planned tariffs on all steel and aluminum imports, potentially reviving a transatlantic trade war unless partners in the world’s deepest trading and investment relationship can broker a deal over the next month.】

item.title: 谷歌和软银斥资 2.3 亿美元支持量子初创公司 QuEra
item.description: 包括 Alphabet 公司旗下谷歌公司和软银集团公司在内的初创企业投资者正押注于量子计算--通常被认为是天马行空的科学实验--越来越接近在现实世界中的广泛应用。【原文：Startup investors including Alphabet Inc.’s Google and SoftBank Group Corp. are betting that quantum computing, often thought of as a fantastical science experiment, is getting closer to having sweeping real-world applications.】

item.title: 高盛和软银支持人工智能初创公司 Tines，估值 11.3 亿美元
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s growth equity unit led a $125 million funding round for software startup Tines Security Services Ltd., valuing the startup at $1.13 billion — and underscoring investors’ appetite for artificial intelligence-powered business tools.】

item.title: 杜邦公司盈利飙升，得益于分拆前电子产品的强劲表现
item.description: 杜邦公司（DuPont de Nemours Inc.【原文：DuPont de Nemours Inc.’s earnings jumped on growth in the electronics market, suggesting the conglomerate’s push to cut costs and break up into smaller, more focused businesses is paying off.】

item.title: 刚果战争余波给负债累累的卢旺达带来风险
item.description: 卢旺达因支持肆虐邻国刚果民主共和国的叛军而面临经济反弹的风险。【原文：Rwanda risks an economic backlash over its support for rebels rampaging through neighboring Democratic Republic of Congo.】

item.title: 印度央行干预抑制投机性卢比押注
item.description: 据一位熟悉印度储备银行想法的人士透露，印度储备银行本周对外汇市场进行了干预，以抑制卢比的投机行为。【原文：The Reserve Bank of India intervened in the foreign exchange market this week to curb speculation in the rupee, according to a person familiar with the central bank’s thinking, surprising traders who expected a more hands-off approach on the currency from the new governor.】

item.title: Meta 16 天连胜是扎克伯格人工智能愿景的胜利
item.description: 即使在人工智能获胜者获得丰厚回报的市场中，Meta Platforms 公司也能脱颖而出。该公司股价已连续 16 个交易日上涨，是自 1990 年以来纳斯达克 100 指数公司中连续上涨时间最长的。尽管人们对微软和 Alphabet 的人工智能支出何时能得到回报还存在疑问，但 Meta 的投资改变了它瞄准和衡量广告的方式，这意味着它将更快地获得回报。【原文：Even in a market where AI winners are richly rewarded, Meta Platforms stands out.The shares are coming off a rally of 16 straight sessions, the longest streak of any current Nasdaq 100 Index company going back to 1990. The stock added more than 17% over the surge, bringing its market capitalization above $1.8 trillion.While there are questions about when Microsoft and Alphabet will see a return on their AI spending, Meta’s investment has changed how it targets and measures ads, meaning faster gr】

item.title: 红海船舶流量尚未回升，停火风险仍在蔓延
item.description: 最近几周，尽管也门胡塞武装长期没有发动袭击，但红海的船舶运输仍然缓慢。【原文：Ship traffic through the Red Sea has remained slow in recent weeks despite a prolonged period without attacks from Yemen’s Houthis.】

item.title: 天然气储量水平下降，德国就天然气储量支持问题展开激烈谈判
item.description: 德国天然气市场管理公司表示，在欧洲濒临又一次供应紧张的边缘之际，该公司正在与有关部门 "深入讨论 "为储气库再充气提供补贴的可能性。【原文：Germany’s gas market manager said it’s in “intensive discussions” with authorities about potential subsidies to refill storage sites as Europe teeters on the edge of another supply crunch.】

item.title: 英国将出售创纪录的 130 亿英镑债券，出价超过历史最高水平
item.description: 英国将出售创纪录的 130 亿英镑（160 亿美元）10 年期债券，因为投资者热衷于锁定接近数十年高点的收益率，对此类证券的需求达到历史最高水平。【原文：The UK is set to sell a record £13 billion ($16 billion) of 10-year bonds after attracting the highest-ever demand for such securities from investors keen to lock-in yields near multi-decade highs.】

item.title: 特姆公司在关税之后全面整顿供应链，面临涨价风险
item.description: 面对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的新关税政策，在线购物巨头特姆普（Temu）将放弃对其中国供应链的实质性控制，此举有可能推高这款经济型购物应用的价格。【原文：Online shopping giant Temu is giving up substantial control of its Chinese supply chain in the face of President Donald Trump’s new tariffs, a move that threatens to drive up prices on the budget shopping app.】

item.title: 卡莱尔的施瓦茨实现了 2024 年的目标。他的下一步将决定他的命运。
item.description: 凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.首席执行官哈维?【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. Chief Executive Officer Harvey Schwartz capped his second year in the top job hitting the goals he set for 2024.】

item.title: 大量美国工人未披露慢性病状况
item.description: 一项新的研究显示，慢性病正在给美国劳动力造成巨大损失，而造成这种损失的部分原因是许多员工不愿将自己的情况告诉雇主。【原文：Chronic health conditions are taking a toll on the US workforce, one that’s partly hidden because many employees are reluctant to tell employers about their situation, according to a new study.】

item.title: Meta Rally 利用人工智能发起进攻，创造历史
item.description: 即使在人工智能优胜者获得奖励的市场中，Meta Platforms 公司的股票也能脱颖而出。【原文：Even in a market where artificial intelligence winners are rewarded, Meta Platforms Inc. shares stand out.】

item.title: 奥特曼抨击马斯克的收购要约，称其试图放慢 OpenAI 的发展速度
item.description: OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）表示，该公司 "非卖品"，而埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）很可能是想通过主动出价收购这家人工智能先驱来拖延公司的进展。【原文：OpenAI Chief Executive Officer Sam Altman said the company is “not for sale” and Elon Musk is probably trying to delay its progress with an unsolicited bid for the artificial intelligence pioneer.】
